item.title: 尽管亮起红灯，Polymarket 对华尔街选举 "游戏计划 "的影响仍在扩大
item.description: 尽管投资者对基于加密货币的预测市场 Polymarket 所发出的信号的信任程度普遍持怀疑态度，但华尔街仍在密切关注这个显示唐纳德-特朗普很有可能赢得美国总统大选的平台上的赌注。【原文：Despite widespread skepticism about how much trust investors should place in the signals being sent by cryptocurrency-based predictions market Polymarket, Wall Street is paying close attention to betting on the platform that shows a high chance Donald Trump will win the US presidential election.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔称欧洲央行不应急于进一步降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）认为，欧洲中央银行不应急于降低借贷成本，也不应为了刺激经济而将借贷成本降至所谓的中性利率以下。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t hurry to lower borrowing costs and go below the so-called neutral rate to stimulate the economy, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 大选风险令美元套期保值成本飙升至 2022 年以来最高水平
item.description: 由于交易商准备应对下周总统大选后市场大幅波动的风险，对冲美元波动的价格飙升至近两年来的最高点。【原文：The price to hedge against swings in the US dollar surged to the highest in nearly two years as traders prepare for the risk of big market moves after next week’s presidential election.】

item.title: 欺诈调查后，特拉菲古拉公司在蒙古面临 11 亿美元的损失
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Trafigura 集团在发现其蒙古石油业务员工涉嫌欺诈后，正准备承担 11 亿美元的损失。【原文：Trafigura Group is preparing to take a $1.1 billion hit after discovering what it suspects was fraud involving employees in its Mongolian oil business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 里斯塔德称 "欧佩克+"今年不会恢复石油产量
item.description: 据瑞斯塔德能源公司（Rystad Energy）称，欧佩克及其盟国今年不太可能恢复石油产量，因为生产商正在从成品油中 "赚大钱"。【原文：OPEC and its allies aren’t likely to bring oil output back this year because producers are “making huge money” from refined products, according to Rystad Energy.】

item.title: 里夫斯上调资本利得税，称英国仍具竞争力
item.description: 英国政府取消了资本利得税率，企业家们在出售企业时需要支付更多的税款。【原文：The UK government has lifted its tax rates on capital gains, with entrepreneurs on the hook for a larger bill when they sell their businesses.】

item.title: 美国大选前企业借款人涌入债券市场
item.description: 企业借款人正在利用下周美国总统大选前可能是最后一次发行高等级债务的机会。【原文：Corporate borrowers are taking advantage of what might be the last opportunity to issue high-grade debt before the US presidential election next week.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦说，决定欧洲未来的是各国政府而非欧洲央行
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行正在面对新的经济现实，各国政府也应如此。【原文：The European Central Bank is confronting new economic realities and governments should do the same, said Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 美国将击败中国，成为米涅瓦州最大的牛肉进口国
item.description: 美国将成为南美主要牛肉供应商 Minerva SA 最大的出口客户，超过中国。【原文：The US is set to become the largest export customer of Minerva SA, the leading South American beef supplier, eclipsing China.】

item.title: 芝加哥市长提议提高房产税，违背竞选誓言
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）提议增加 3 亿美元的财产税，以弥补明年近 10 亿美元的预算缺口。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is proposing a $300 million property tax hike — breaking a campaign promise — to help close next year’s nearly $1 billion budget shortfall.】

item.title: 以色列中央银行就抵押贷款和建筑风险向贷款人发出警告
item.description: 以色列央行周三会见了当地贷款机构的高级官员，讨论他们在建筑和房地产行业的风险敞口。【原文：Israel’s central bank met senior officials from local lenders on Wednesday to discuss their exposure to the construction and real estate sectors.】

item.title: KKR 与 Capital Group 携手为富裕投资者推出基金
item.description: Capital Group 与 KKR & Co.合作，将于明年上半年首次推出两只面向富裕人士的基金，投资范围涵盖公共和私人债务市场。【原文：Capital Group and KKR & Co. partnered to debut two funds for wealthy individuals in the first half of next year that invest across public and private debt markets.】

item.title: 外交摩擦升级，加拿大预测印度将进行黑客攻击
item.description: 随着两国外交关系跌至一代人以来的最低谷，加拿大正准备应对印度政府支持的黑客攻击。【原文：Canada is bracing for Indian government-backed hacking as the two nations’ diplomatic relationship nosedives to its lowest ebb in a generation.】

item.title: 苹果推出配备 M4 芯片的 MacBook Pro，掀起升级狂潮
item.description: 苹果公司发布了配备全新 M4 芯片的更新版 MacBook Pro 系列，希望以更快的处理速度和人工智能功能吸引消费者。【原文：Apple Inc. unveiled an updated MacBook Pro lineup with new M4 chips, looking to entice shoppers with speedier processing and AI capabilities.】

item.title: 赫斯称圭亚那石油产量因维护下降 11
item.description: 由于埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）暂时关闭了其三艘生产船只中的两艘，以连接一条新的天然气岸上管道，圭亚那的石油产量在第三季度下降了 11%。【原文：Guyana’s oil output dropped 11% in the third quarter as Exxon Mobil Corp. temporarily shut down two of its three production vessels to connect a new gas-to-shore pipeline.】

item.title: 特姆公司将就非法产品销售处理问题接受欧盟调查
item.description: 欧盟将对 Temu 展开调查，因为担心该公司未能遏制非法产品的在线销售。【原文：The European Union is set to launch an investigation into Temu over concerns it is failing to curb the sale of illegal products online, in a probe that could lead to hefty fines for the e-commerce service.】

item.title: KKR 与 Energy Capital Partners 建立价值 500 亿美元的人工智能合作伙伴关系
item.description: KKR & Co.和 Energy Capital Partners 同意建立价值 500 亿美元的合作伙伴关系，以加快人工智能基础设施的发展。【原文：KKR & Co. and Energy Capital Partners agreed to a $50 billion partnership to accelerate the development of infrastructure for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 瑞士律师藏匿俄罗斯黑钱遭美国制裁
item.description: 一对瑞士律师因帮助非法资金通过空壳公司从俄罗斯流出而受到美国制裁，美国正试图对为持续违法行为提供法律掩护的瑞士中介机构施加压力。【原文：A pair of Swiss lawyers were hit by US sanctions for helping illegal money flow from Russia through shell companies, as it seeks to put pressure on intermediaries in Switzerland that offer legal cover for continued violations.】

item.title: 债券大跌给 "鞭打之年 "的快钱专家们带来新的打击
item.description: 本月国债市场的溃败打击了追逐趋势的量化投资者，他们已经建立了看涨债券的头寸，这是这种策略的最新挫折，今年在市场震荡中，这种策略有时会严重失灵。【原文：This month’s rout in Treasuries is hammering trend-chasing quant investors who had built up bullish positions in bonds, the latest setback for a strategy that has misfired badly at times this year amid market convulsions.】

item.title: 一品脱啤酒酒精税下调后英国酒吧股上涨
item.description: 英国政府宣布将生啤酒税削减 1.7%，相当于每品脱啤酒的成本降低了 1 便士，随后英国最大的酒馆集团股价上涨。【原文：Shares in Britain’s biggest pub groups rose after the government announced a 1.7% cut in duty on draft alcoholic drinks, the equivalent of 1 pence off the cost of a pint of beer.】

item.title: 在业界一片哗然声中，英国不再提高北海税收
item.description: 英国政府在加强北海油气生产商税收制度方面没有采取比已经宣布的措施更进一步的措施，在该行业提出抗议后，政府保留了暴利税中的资本津贴。【原文：The UK government went no further in toughening up the tax regime for North Sea oil and gas producers than measures already announced, keeping capital allowances in the windfall tax following protests from the industry.】

item.title: 英国将出售 2970 亿英镑债券为工党财政计划提供资金
item.description: 英国公布了一项历史上规模最大的债券销售计划，将销售额提高了 190 亿英镑（247 亿美元），以帮助为新工党政府的经济议程提供资金。【原文：The UK unveiled an historically large bond-sale plan, increasing sales by £19 billion ($24.7 billion) to help finance the new Labour government’s economic agenda.】

item.title: 问与答：2024 年美国大选对您的资金意味着什么？
item.description: 问与答：2024 年美国大选对您的资金意味着什么？【原文：Q&A: What the 2024 US election means for your money】

item.title: 私募股权投资经理将从四月起为英国收入缴纳 32% 的税款
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在预算案中表示，从 2025 年 4 月起，私募股权经理人必须为其结转利息收益缴纳 32% 的税款。【原文：Private equity managers will have to pay 32% tax on their carried interest gains from April 2025, Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said in the budget.】

item.title: 被制裁的液化天然气运输船聚集在俄罗斯附近，买家稀少
item.description: 来自俄罗斯的液化天然气油轮正在该国远东海岸附近集结，这表明在西方不断收紧的限制措施下，很难找到买家。【原文：Tankers carrying sanctioned liquefied natural gas from Russia are gathering off the country’s far eastern coast, a sign of the difficulties in finding buyers in the midst of ever-tightening western restrictions.】

item.title: 超微计算机审计师安永在司法部调查中辞职
item.description: 陷入困境的服务器制造商超微计算机公司的审计师安永会计师事务所（Ernst & Young LLP）已辞去该公司注册会计师的职务。【原文：Ernst & Young LLP, the auditor to troubled server maker Super Micro Computer Inc., has resigned as the company’s registered public accounting firm.】

item.title: 德国通胀率大幅上升，凸显欧洲央行面临的挑战
item.description: 德国通胀率的上升速度超过预期，并超过了欧洲央行 2% 的目标--这凸显了政策制定者在决定进一步放宽货币政策的步伐和程度时所面临的挑战。【原文：German inflation quickened more sharply than expected and exceeded the European Central Bank’s 2% target – underpinning the challenges for policymakers in deciding on the pace and extent of further monetary-policy easing.】

item.title: Coinbase 零售需求成为症结所在，利润却出现反弹
item.description: 鉴于许多散户交易者似乎仍然对动荡的加密货币世界保持警惕，第三季度收入的激增可能不足以消除投资者对 Coinbase Global Inc.【原文：A surge in third-quarter revenue may not be enough to lift the investor reluctance that seems to surround Coinbase Global Inc. given that many retail traders appear to remain wary of the volatile world of cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 总统的所有动向特朗普贸易结束了吗？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 中国房市放缓，万科第三季度亏损 25 亿美元
item.description: 中国万科集团（China Vanke Co., Ltd.）报告了至少自 2004 年以来的最大季度亏损，凸显了这家房地产开发商在中国房地产长期低迷的情况下努力偿还债务所面临的压力。【原文：China Vanke Co. reported its biggest quarterly loss since at least 2004, underscoring the pressure on the property developer as it tries to pay off debts amid the country’s prolonged housing slump.】
